title: Android 13 allows the Pixel 6 and other devices to run virtual machines with Windows and Linux
content:
Android is already a flexible platform, but it seems power users will get even more flexibility in the next major update. Thanks to Android 13, phones such as the Pixel 6 are able to run virtual machines for Windows and Linux with better performance and fewer headaches.

more…

The post Android 13 allows the Pixel 6 and other devices to run virtual machines with Windows and Linux appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Android 13 isn't a massive update so far, but it does include some improvements to virtualization which allowed Windows to boot on a Pixel.
